categories.Appetizers: The perfect start to your meal - enjoy our delicious appetizers
categories.Salads: Fresh and crisp - a healthy choice for every taste
categories.Breadsticks: Crispy rolls, freshly baked with delicious ingredients
categories.Pizza: Our pizzas - crispy, hearty, and irresistibly delicious
categories.Custom Pizza: Create your own pizza with your favorite ingredients
categories.Calzone: Stuffed pizza - a delight for lovers of hearty flavors
categories.Pasta: Italian classics - freshly prepared pasta with delicious sauces
categories.Meat Dishes: Juicy meat specialties, perfectly prepared for connoisseurs
categories.Burgers & Baguettes: Filling and tasty - our burgers and baguettes
categories.American Diner: A taste experience straight from the USA - our Americana dishes
categories.French Fries: Crispy French fries - a popular side dish for any meal
categories.Desserts: Sweet temptations - the perfect ending to your meal
categories.Ice Cream: Refreshing and creamy - our delicious ice cream specialties
categories.Alcoholic Drinks: Enjoy our selection of beers, wines, and more

cocaCola.name: Coca Cola 1,0l (REUSABLE)
cocaCola.description: Refreshing soft drink with caffeine (10,00 mg/100 ml)

allergens: Contains caffeine. Not recommended for children or pregnant women
nutritionFacts: Ingredients: Water, sugar, carbon dioxide, coloring E 150d, acidifier phosphoric acid, natural flavor, caffeine flavor.

cocaColaLight.name: Coca Cola light 1,0l (REUSABLE)
cocaColaLight.description: Low-calorie soft drink with caffeine (12,00 mg/100 ml)

allergens: Contains caffeine. Not recommended for children or pregnant women
nutritionFacts: Ingredients: Water, carbon dioxide, coloring E 150d, acidifiers (phosphoric acid, citric acid), sweeteners (sodium cyclamate, acesulfame K, aspartame), natural flavor including caffeine. Contains a source of phenylalanine.

Ingredients: Water, sugar, orange juice from orange juice concentrate, carbon dioxide, acidifiers (citric acid, malic acid), citrus extract, acidity regulator sodium gluconate, flavoring, antioxidant ascorbic acid, stabilizers (E 440, E 414, E 445, and E 412), coloring carotene.

mezzoMix.name: Mezzo Mix 1,0l (REUSABLE)
mezzoMix.description: Refreshing mix of cola and orange flavor with caffeine (6,00 mg/100 ml)

allergens: Contains caffeine. Not recommended for children or pregnant women.
nutritionFacts: Ingredients: Water, sugar, fructose, orange juice from orange juice concentrate (1.5%), carbon dioxide, coloring E 150d, acidifiers citric acid, malic acid; flavoring, caffeine flavor, stabilizer E 412.

Ingredients: Water, sugar, carbon dioxide, acidifier citric acid, lemon juice from lemon juice concentrate (1%), lime juice from lime juice concentrate (0.1%), acidity regulator sodium citrate, natural lemon and lime flavor.

nutritionFacts: Ingredients: Apple juice, carbonated water.

Ingredients: Apple juice.

redBull.name: Red Bull 1,0l (REUSABLE)
redBull.description: Energy drink with high caffeine content (32 mg/100 ml). Not recommended for children, pregnant, or breast-feeding women

allergens: High caffeine content. Not recommended for children or pregnant or breast-feeding women.
nutritionFacts: Ingredients: Water, sucrose, glucose, acidifier (citric acid), carbon dioxide, taurine (0.4%), acidity regulators (sodium carbonates, magnesium carbonates), caffeine (0.03%), vitamins (niacin, pantothenic acid, B6, B12), flavorings, colorings (caramel color, riboflavins).
